channel.title: Make admin on 517
channel.description: I have searched the forums for what i'm looking for and i haven't found it. the only thing i have seen on how to make admin is changing rights in the mainsave folder but that does not work.

item.title: Make admin on 517
item.dc:creator: @0wn3r_k4t3 0wn3r k4t3
item.description:
@0wn3r_k4t3 wrote:

First go into net > codec > RS2LoginProtocol.java .
Than search

Engine.fileManager.loadCharacter(p); Engine.fileManager.loadFList(p); if (password != null && p.password != null && !p.password.equalsIgnoreCase("") && !p.password.equals(password)) { returnCode = 3; } else { p.password = password; }
Under that code add this

if (p.username.equals("YOUR USERNAME HERE")) {
		 p.username.equals("ADMIN USERNAME HERE") ||
		 p.username.equals("ADMIN USERNAME HERE") ||
		 p.username.equals("ADMIN USERNAME HERE") ||
		 p.username.equals("ADMIN USERNAME HERE") ||
		 p.username.equals("ADMIN USERNAME HERE"))
		p.rights = 2;
}

	    if (p.username.equals("MOD USERNAME HERE") {
		 p.username.equals("MOD USERNAME HERE") ||
		 p.username.equals("MOD USERNAME HERE"))
		p.rights = 1;
}

What this does it if a certain usename above is used to login thay are automatically Admin/Mod. Just add your username and replace MOD USERNAME HERE or ADMIN USERNAME HERE. Hope i helped
